https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sCSQFK9kMsprT4jgWqgw82dT6WI.jpg In the 1930s, bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks. Bonnie and Clyde
